articles.content:
Tom Grennan paid for a Coventry City fan to fly from Argentina to attend the play-off final at Wembley - even though the popstar will miss it.

articles.title: Pope appoints successor to archbishop of Buenos Aires
articles.description: The pontiff said he might finally return home to visit Argentina.
articles.content:
Pope Francis has tapped an Argentine bishop with years of ministry in the country’s prisons as his successor as archbishop of Buenos Aires, a day after again saying he might finally visit his home country next year.

articles.title: Report of Argentina fraud probe sinks shares in dLocal
articles.description: Uruguayan fintech dLocal, the South American country's first unicorn, saw its shares plummet on Friday, after Argentine news outlet Infobae published an article saying the government was investigating it for a possible fraud of at least $400 million.
